definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Sanjiaodai rubber production, sales zinc oxide, magnesium oxide, and other chemical raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 生产橡胶三角带，销售氧化锌，氧化镁等化工原料。

sentences.english: Magnesium aluminum hydroxides show higher adsorption capacity to the model pitch and stickies at neutral pH.
sentences.chinese: 氢氧化镁铝对树脂和胶黏物在中性条件下吸附量较大。

sentences.english: Preparation of magnesia whiskers by high-temperature flux method;
sentences.chinese: 采用循环晶种的方法制取了氢氧化镁。

sentences.english: Experiments show that magnesia can greatly improve the removal efficiency of sulfur dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，氧化镁可以极大地提高吸收液的脱硫效率。

sentences.english: Objective This paper focused on adjusting the release rates of risperidone from PLGA microspheres by co-encapsulating Mg(OH)2.
sentences.chinese: 目的用氢氧化镁调节利培酮PLGA微球的释放速度。

sentences.english: A series of hydrophilic and hydrophobic nanometer magnesia particles have been fabricated.
sentences.chinese: 制备了一系列亲水型和亲油型的纳米氧化镁粉体。

sentences.english: The influence of operating conditions on the performance of Mg(OH) 2 is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了试验条件对氢氧化镁性能的影响。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder winch surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超细活性氢氧化镁是一种重要的环保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: The hydration of periclase in the magnesia is the theoretical basis for its expansion.
sentences.chinese: 方镁石的水化是轻烧氧化镁膨胀的理论基础。

sentences.english: The influences of temperature and reactant amount on the yield and quality of magnesium oxide are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了温度及反应物用量对氧化镁产率和质量的影响。

sentences.english: Light-burned magnesia is prepared by calcining magnesite.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过煅烧菱镁矿制备轻烧氧化镁。

sentences.english: The advances in production Process and Method of Ultrafine Magnesium Hydroxide is researched.
sentences.chinese: 就超细氢氧化镁阻燃剂的制作与阻燃性能做出研究。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new route to prepare magnesium oxide whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了一种合成氧化镁晶须的新的工艺方法。

sentences.english: Super-fine magnesium hydroxide powder which surface is treated is a kind of environment-friendly fire-retardant of polymer.
sentences.chinese: 超细活性氢氧化镁是一种重要的环保型阻燃材料。

sentences.english: With the process according to the invention a lactate salt is formed and magnesium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用本发明的方法形成乳酸盐和氢氧化镁。

sentences.english: Some principles in preparing of high purity magnesium oxide are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 简要分析了高纯氧化镁合成中的一些工艺原理。
